Interface SocketServer.Handler

All Known Implementing Classes:
HTTPServer, SocketServer.Echo
Enclosing class:
SocketServer
public static interface SocketServer.Handler

The interface to handle a connection.

          The method that will be called when a connection is made.

Method Detail

handle

void handle(SocketServer server,
            Socket connection)
            throws IOException
The method that will be called when a connection is made. The method will be called on its own, independent thread.

Parameters:
server - The object that is serving up the request
connection - The socket of the connection that was made
Throws:
IOException - If there is an error

log

void log(int level,
         String message)
How to handle logging of events.

Parameters:
level - 0 = vital information, 100 = trivial information
message - The message to log

log

void log(Exception exception)
Log that an exception occurred.

Parameters:
exception - The exception the occurred.
